page.title: 02THE CHURCH AT FOBBING
page.content: {FOBBING CHURCH}WAS BUILT IN{NORMAN {TIMES}IT IS MADE OF FLINT.INSIDE THE CHURCH HAS WOODEN BEAMS.{ST.MICHAEL's {CHURCH}HAS TWO STAINED GLASS WINDOWS ONE OF MARY AND JESUS THE OTHER OF{ST. {MICHAEL.}THE CHURCH HAS ABOUT 24 PEWS,SOME OF WHICH HAVE CARVINGS OF17 CENTURY SHIPS, ON THE SEATS.THERE ARE THREE MAIN ROOMS IN THE CHURCH.ONE OF WHICH IS A CELLAR IN WHICH SMUGGLERS KEPT THEIR GOODS UNTIL THEY WERE COLLECTED BY THEIR CUSTOMERS. THERE ARE 104 STEPS UP TO THE BELL TOWER. THE BELLS ARE MADE OF STEEL. A LOOKOUT USED TO BE KEPT IN THE BELL TOWER BY THE SMUGGLERS.YOU CAN SEE RIGHT ACROSS THE{FOBBING MARSHES. THE{VINEGAR BIBLE}WAS QUITE INTERESTING BECAUSE A LOT OF THE WORDS WERE MISSPELT.IT WAS MADE IN 1852. THERE IS ALSO A BOOK OF MARRIAGES IN THE CHURCH.
